titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the raising of 66666 l. 13 s. 4 d. by way of loane, for the better enabling of our brethern of Scotland for our assistance and defence in this common cause of our religion and liberty.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: In this edition, p. 8 begins: places.
Not to be confused with the ordinance of the same title published in 1644.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
